      • DUMP_MEMORY_INFO

        @S4Boolean(defaultValue=false)
public static final String DUMP_MEMORY_INFO
        The property for the boolean property that controls whether or not the recognizer will display detailed memory information while it is running. The default value is true.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • copyModels

        public void copyModels(String context)
                throws IOException
        Copy the model.

        This method copies to model set, possibly to a new location and new format. This is useful if one wants to convert from binary to ascii and vice versa, or from a directory structure to a JAR file. If only one model is used, then name can be null.

        Specified by:
        copyModels in interface TrainManager
        Parameters:
        context - this TrainManager's context
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while loading the data

      • trainContextIndependentModels

        public void trainContextIndependentModels(String context)
                                   throws IOException
        Trains context independent models. If the initialization stage was skipped, it loads models from files, automatically.
        Specified by:
        trainContextIndependentModels in interface TrainManager
        Parameters:
        context - the context of this train manager.
        Throws:
        IOException - if IO went wrong
